# CHANGELOG

## v4.1.2
* NODE-3479: Change the oom_x and restart_x file location to logs folder

## v4.1.1
* Changed environment from DEPLOY_ENV to NODE_ENV when used in email subject as part of using NODE_ENV as a primary env for unit tests

## v4.1.0
* Moved runtime error from service-instrument-ebay to this module to share between other modules

## v4.0.1
* Added email category

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v1.0.4
* Added config to enable/disable email alerts per type.

## v1.0.1
* Added `reset()` function

## v1.0.0
* Initial Version: Added email sending and restart file update functionality
